thread.title: Marco van Basten’s eight-point plan to shake up football upsets Premier League as he wants to ditch offside and bring in sin bins

author: ituckey
title: Marco van Basten’s eight-point plan to shake up football upsets Premier League as he wants to ditch offside and bring in sin bins
text:
EFL VANTASY LAND! Marco van Basten’s eight-point plan to shake up football upsets Premier League as he wants to ditch offside and bring in sin bins 
Holland legend's radical ideas are opposed by top bosses in England like Arsene Wenger and Slaven Bilic By PHIL CADDEN
